description.raw:
Implement OSRFCIWorkflow class to handle the following orchestration:

   * set status in bitbucket: in progress
   * compilation
   * set status in bitbucket: ok if all went fine, failed if unstable or error

We will need to change our entry point from the bitbucket <-> jenkins daemon to point to this new x-ci-pr_any jobs, which will act as a the main CI job.

Future work:

   * Add windows and brew to the orchestration
   * Improve the information and links that arrives to bitbucket when something fail
   * Migrate ABI checking triggering to the orchestration
